citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:25 pm on 20-
November-2023. The inspector arrived at the facility and contacted the facility representative that stated no one was
available to conduct an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:25 pm on 20-
November-2023.  The inspector arrived at the facility and contacted the facility representative  that stated no one was 
available to conduct an inspection. 
 
 
End Section
